introduction.para: This node is required to register a Help 2.0 document.

entry.para: This attribute is optional. You need it if your index is in a separate file (*.HxI).
This attribute is optional. You just need it if you have a combined full-text search file (*.HxQ) installed with your Help 2.0 collection.

Because the Help 2.0 API is not documented, there is no real explanation of this attribute. Sorry. My guess is that this attribute specifies the ID of the disk medium (CD, Floppy, or whatever) if the file is on a removable medium. So, if you try to open the document, the viewer asks for the valid medium and checks its ID with this given value.
